content.text: During any given installation phase, additional pathway systems should be installed to enable the  subsequent installation of additional cables to minimise the number of future excavations that are both  disruptive and costly.
Underground cable management systems (e.g. pipes, ducts) should be made from suitable material. All  underground cable management systems should be made of a non-porous material.
